foreignData.name: Überfall-Kommandant
foreignData.text:
Wälder, die du kontrollierst, sind 1/1 grüne Elf-Kreaturen, die auch noch Länder sind.
{1}{G}, opfere einen Elf: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält +3/+3 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.name: Comandante de emboscada
foreignData.text:
Los bosques que controlas son criaturas Elfo verde 1/1 que siguen siendo tierras.
{1}{G}, sacrificar un Elfo: La criatura objetivo obtiene +3/+3 hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.name: Commandant d'embuscade
foreignData.text:
Les forêts que vous contrôlez sont des créatures 1/1 vertes Elfe, mais restent toujours des terrains.
{1}{G}, Sacrifiez un elfe : La créature ciblée gagne +3/+3 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.name: Capo Imboscata
foreignData.text:
Le foreste che controlli sono creature Elfo 1/1 verdi che sono ancora terre.
{1}{G}, Sacrifica un Elfo: La creatura bersaglio prende +3/+3 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.name: Comandante de Emboscada
foreignData.text:
As florestas que você controla são criaturas verdes 1/1 do tipo Elfo que ainda contam como terrenos.
{1}{G}, Sacrifique um Elfo: A criatura alvo recebe +3/+3 até o final do turno.

name: Ambush Commander
originalText:
Forests you control are 1/1 green Elf creatures that are still lands.
{1}{G}, Sacrifice an Elf: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

text:
Forests you control are 1/1 green Elf creatures that are still lands.
{1}{G}, Sacrifice an Elf: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
